sources.name: wraglingdataset
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~>  wraglingdataset

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared wraglingdataset = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://storageacct1010.blob.core.windows.net/data/input/employee.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = wraglingdataset,
  #"Removed columns" = Table.RemoveColumns(Source, {"gender"})
in
  #"Removed columns";
